lyric:
[by:莜珺]
[00:09.74]Kiss me hard before you go
[00:14.04]Summertime sadness
[00:18.44]I just wanted you to know
[00:22.48]That baby you're the best
[00:26.88]I got my red dress on tonight
[00:31.08]Dancing in the dark in the pale moonlight
[00:35.44]Done my hair up real big beauty queen style
[00:40.05]High heels off, I'm feeling alive
[00:45.56]Oh, my God, I feel it in the air
[00:49.65]Telephone wires above are sizzling like your snare
[00:54.16]Honey, I'm on fire I feel it everywhere
[00:58.74]Nothing scares me anymore
[01:04.90]Kiss me hard before you go
[01:08.69]Summertime sadness
[01:13.46]I just wanted you to know
[01:17.62]That baby you're the best
[01:23.03]I've got that summertime, summertime sadness
[01:26.94]S-s-summertime, summertime sadness
[01:32.05]Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[01:36.75]Oh, oh-oh oh-oh
[01:39.94]I'm feeling e-lec-tric tonight
[01:43.68]Cruising down the coast goin' 'bout 99
[01:48.14]Got my bad baby by my heavenly side
[01:52.66]I know if I go, I'll die happy tonight
[01:58.02]Oh, my God, I feel it in the air
[02:02.33]Telephone wires above are sizzling like a snare Honey, I'm on fire I feel it everywhere
[02:11.48]Nothing scares me anymore
[02:16.70]Kiss me hard before you go
[02:21.09]Summertime sadness
[02:25.73]I just wanted you to know
[02:29.98]That baby you're the best
[02:35.74]I've got that summertime, summertime sadness
[02:39.85]S-s-summertime, summertime sadness
[02:44.70]Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[02:49.26]Oh, oh-oh oh-oh
[03:11.56]Think I'll miss you forever
[03:15.26]Like the stars miss the sun in the morning sky
[03:20.52]Late is better than never
[03:24.47]Even if you're gone I'm gonna drive, drive, drive
[03:34.88]I've got that summertime, summertime sadness
[03:38.93]S-s-summertime, summertime sadness
[03:43.08]Got that summertime, summertime sadness
[03:48.23]Oh, oh-oh oh-oh
